channel.title: [PI] Two Questions Please Help
channel.description:
Question 1: a week ago I tried to put my server online so i made a no-ip account and i put my ip in the gui file and then i copied the file and put it online, it didn't work i changed my ip back to 127.0.0.1 on the gui file and it would let me play it and today it says no response for server, please try using a different world.
my source, run.bat file said; Loaded clipmap in 172ms. [1/27/12 8:19 PM]: Launching InsidiaX... [1/27/12 8:19 PM]: Loaded clipmap in 156ms. [1/27/12 8:19 PM]: Server listening on port 0.0.0.0:43594
my client, run.bat file said; Embodied Pkz is loading.. java.io.FileNotFoundException: C:\insidiaXV8cache\Maps\mapConfig.txt (The system cannot find the file specified) at java.io.FileInputStream.open(Native Method) at java.io.FileInputStream.<init>(FileInputStream.jav a:138) at java.io.FileInputStream.<init>(FileInputStream.jav a:97) at java.io.FileReader.<init>(FileReader.java:58) at client.setNewMaps(client.java:111) at client.startUp(client.java:9047) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:33) at client.run(client.java:6073) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:722) Loaded 525 graphics... Loaded Compressed Models.. Loading animations Loaded the flo. 602 NPC Amount: 11257 ---
I'm not sure if there's a problem
What can I do to fix it?
Question 2: okay, where it says 'Welcome To Embodied Pkz' Where do I go to change the login tab where it says 'Play *****'? -- Thanks!

@austindr wrote:

What could I do to fix this? I’m using an Insidia Base

item.title: [PI] Two Questions Please Help
item.dc:creator: @b3aster b3aster
item.description:
@b3aster wrote:

  1. Sounds like mapConfig.txt is in the wrong place.
    2.Well it sounds like your mapConfig.txt isn’t in the right place or isn’t in the right spot. some where in the client called client.java.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Two Questions Please Help
item.dc:creator: @austindr austindr
item.description:
@austindr wrote:

Question 1: a week ago I tried to put my server online so i made a no-ip account and i put my ip in the gui file and then i copied the file and put it online, it didn’t work i changed my ip back to 127.0.0.1 on the gui file and it would let me play it and today it says no response for server, please try using a different world.

my source, run.bat file said;
Loaded clipmap in 172ms.
[1/27/12 8:19 PM]: Launching InsidiaX…
[1/27/12 8:19 PM]: Loaded clipmap in 156ms.
[1/27/12 8:19 PM]: Server listening on port 0.0.0.0:43594

my client, run.bat file said;
Embodied Pkz is loading…
java.io.FileNotFoundException: C:\insidiaXV8cache\Maps\mapConfig.txt (The system
cannot find the file specified)
at java.io.FileInputStream.open(Native Method)
at java.io.FileInputStream.(FileInputStream.jav a:138)
at java.io.FileInputStream.(FileInputStream.jav a:97)
at java.io.FileReader.(FileReader.java:58)
at client.setNewMaps(client.java:111)
at client.startUp(client.java:9047)
at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:33)
at client.run(client.java:6073)
at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:722)
Loaded 525 graphics…
Loaded Compressed Models…
Loading animations
Loaded the flo.
602 NPC Amount: 11257

I’m not sure if there’s a problem

What can I do to fix it?

Question 2: okay, where it says ‘Welcome To Embodied Pkz’
Where do I go to change the login tab where it says ‘Play *****’?

Thanks!

Read full topic
